settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and application settings.
settings.currencyDescription: Set the currency for all prices.
login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
login.failedDescription: Please check your credentials and try again.
register.title: Register
register.description: Create an account to get started.
register.successDescription: You can now log in with your new account.
pos.scanToBegin: Scan a product to begin a new sale.
pos.scanProductDescription: Enter a product barcode to add it to the sale.
pos.confirmSaleDescription: You are about to complete the transaction. Please confirm the total amount.
pos.productNotFound: Product with this barcode not found.
pos.emptyCartDescription: Add items to the cart before completing a sale.
receipt.title: Sale Receipt
reports.title: AI-Powered Sales Analysis
reports.description: Generate a summary of recent sales to identify trends and potential stock shortages.
reports.loadingDescription: The AI is processing recent transactions. This may take a moment.
inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: View, add, and edit your product inventory.
inventory.addDescription: Fill out the form to add a new product to your inventory.
inventory.editDescription: Update the details for this product.
inventory.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the product. This action cannot be undone.
inventory.deleteFailedDescription: This product may be associated with past sales.
stats.title: Sales Statistics
suppliers.title: Supplier Management
suppliers.description: Manage your suppliers and their purchase orders.
suppliers.noSuppliers: No suppliers found. Add one to get started.
suppliers.name: Supplier Name
suppliers.addDescription: Fill in the details to add a new supplier.
suppliers.deleteFailedDescription: This supplier may have purchase orders associated with it.
suppliers.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the supplier. This action cannot be undone.
suppliers.noPurchaseOrders: No purchase orders for this supplier yet.
po.title: New Purchase Order
po.noProducts: No products in this order yet.
po.completedNotice: This order is complete and stock has been updated. No further edits are possible.
po.completeConfirmDescription: This will add the ordered quantities to your product stock levels. This action cannot be undone.
inventory.categoriesDescription: Add, edit, or delete product categories.
inventory.categoryFormDescription: Provide a name for the category.
inventory.deleteCategoryConfirmDescripti: Products in this category will not be deleted, but they will become uncategorized. This action cannot be undone.
